metadata.title: Memory Options available with the RA4L1 MCUs

sections.content:
Question:
What memory options do the RA4L1 MCUs support for demanding applications with larger memory needs?
Answer:
To support the diverse and demanding application needs, the RA4L1 Group MCUs support multiple internal memory options.
256 or 512k dual bank embedded flash with 8 Kbytes of Dataflash providing an area of memory idea for data storage with a higher write / erase count
Quad SPI memory interface with Execute-In-Place, which can be used in Quad or single SPI mode to access external flash or RAM memory. Two memory devices can be attached to the QSPI interface using chip selects.
Suitable Products
RA4L1
